entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.

Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
